name: n-butyl Lithium (15% / 23% w/w in Hexane)

specifications.key: Assay % w/w (NBL Content as active base)
specifications.value:
15.0% w/w +/- 0.05% w/w (For 15% solution) 
 23.0% w/w +/- 0.05% w/w (For 23% solution)

packing: 274 kgs of net material (as 15%) / 270 kgs of net material (as 23%) packed in 450 Ltrs capacity steel containers under nitrogen/argon atmosphere.
applications: n-Butyl Lithium is a highly versatile reagent in organic synthesis, especially in the synthesis of pharmaceutical intermediates

It is used as an initiator in the anionic polymerization of conjugated dienes like butadiene, isoprene and vinyl aromatic compounds like styrene to produce wide variety of useful rubber and plastic goods.
n-Butyl Lithium is used in organic synthesis as a butylating agent (addition and in halogen-metal and hydrogen-metal exchange reactions (Metalations or Lithiations)
note: Alkyl-lithium compounds are stored under inert gas for safety reasons and alsoto prevent loss of activity
manufacturer: Mahidhara chemicals private limited is the leading manufacturer for n-butyl lithium in India. n-Butyllithium (abbreviated n-BuLi) is an organolithium reagent and wide range of uses in the pharmaceutical industry. Our team is well equipped to handle the manufacturing and packaging of n-BuLi as per the requirement.

name: Magnesium Tertiary Butoxide
synonyms: Magnesium tert- butoxide, Magnesium di-tert- butoxide, Magnesiumtert- butoxide, Magnesium 2- methylpropan-2-olate

specifications.value: white to pale yellow color powder

packing: 5 kgs of net material packed in double lined polythene bags under nitrogen atmosphere.14/15 nos of such packets are packed under nitrogen blanket into a 200 Ltrs capacity ring lock steel container.
applications: Magnesium Tertiary Butoxide is used as an Auxiliary product for Organic Synthesis
It is used used as a raw material for the manufacture of Retroviral Drugs.
manufacturer: We at Mahidhara Chemicals Private Limited are one of the largest magnesium tertiary butoxide manufacturer in India. The company introduced the product back in 2008. We take pride in introducing and developing the technology to manufacture “Magnesium Tertiary Butoxide” for the first time in the Country. The parent compound for this chemical product is Tert-butanol. Magnesium tertiary butoxide is available in white to pale yellow colour powder. Magnesium tertiary butoxide chemical is available in a packaging of 5 kgs. Our team is well equipped to handle the manufacturing and packaging of Magnesium Tertiary Butoxide as per the requirement.

name: Sodium Tertiary Butoxide

specifications.value: white to pale yellow color powder

packing: 5 kgs of net material packed in double lined polythene bags under nitrogen atmosphere. 20 nos of such packets are packed under nitrogen blanket into a 2000 Ltrs capacity ring lock steel container
applications: Sodium Tertiary Butoxide is used for deprotonation in the reaction types of alkylation’s, condensations, elimination, isomerizations and rearrangement.
In addition, STB can be used with butyl lithium to give “super base
note: It is flammable and moisture sensitive
manufacturer: Mahidhara chemicals private limited is the leading manufacturer for sodium tertiary butoxide in India. We uses the latest technology for the production of sodium tertiary butoxide. Sodium tertiary butoxide is used widely in the pharmaceutical industry as non-nucleophilic base. With n-Butyl lithium it can be used as the super base for various chemical reactions. The product shows similar reactivity to that of Potassium tertiary Butoxide. It is also used for deprotonation in reaction types of allylations, condensations, elimination, isomerizations and rearrangement. Our team is well equipped to handle the manufacturing and packaging of STB as per the requirement.

name: Sodium Hexamethyl Disilazide (20% / 40% / 1.0M / 2.0M in THF)

specifications.value: Light yellowish red or brown color slight turbid solution
Miscible with most of the organic solvents like THF, toluene & benzene

For 20% solution : 20% +/- 2% w/w 
 For 40% solution : 40% +/- 2% w/w 
 For 1.0M solution : 1.0 +/- 0.1M 
 For 2.0M solution : 2.0 +/- 0.1M

packing: 175/180 kgs net material packed in 200 Ltrs capacity M.S/HDPE Drum under nitrogen blanket
applications: Sodium Hexamethyl Disilazide widely used as metalation agent in Organic Synthesis
manufacturer: Mahidhara chemicals private limited is the leading manufacturer for Sodium Hexamethyl Disilazide in India. Sodium Hexamethyl Disilazide is an organosilicon compound and is used as strong base in various synthesis reactions in the pharmaceutical industry. Our team is well equipped to handle the manufacturing and packaging of Sodium Hexamethyl Disilazide as per the requirement.

name: n-butyl chloride

specifications.value: Miscible with methanol & ether. Immiscible with water
The RT of the sample should match with std. RT

packing: 175/180 Ltrs of net material packed in 210 Liters capacity HDPE Drums
applications: Used as a raw material for making n-Butyl Lithium
Used as a Butylating agent in the manufacture of butyl cellulose.
n-Butyl Chloride is also used in Alkylation reactions.
manufacturer: Mahidhara chemical private limited is one the of leading manufacturers for n-butyl chloride. It is clear, colour less liquid which is volatile in nature. N-butyl chloride manufacturers produces it for various applications and uses. Butyl chloride appears as white liqui with a sharp odor. The Flash point is 20°F and the boiling point is 77-78°C (173°F).  It is Used as a raw material for making n-Butyl Lithium and as a Butylating agent in the manufacture of butyl cellulose. It is also used in Alkylation reactions. It is packed in HDPE Drums. To know more about n-butyl chloride contact Mahidhara chemical private limited.
